results.name: Number T(n,k) of n-node rooted trees in which the maximal number of nodes in paths starting at a leaf and ending at the first branching node or at the root equals k; triangle T(n,k), n>=1, 1<=k<=n, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..141, flattened
